Damji was a rogue IB agent responsible for the poison gas attack.
Vidya continues her search, fearing that Arnab's resemblance to Damji may have led him into trouble.
The address on Damji's record leads Vidya and Rana to a dilapidated flat.
An errand boy from the neighbourhood tea stall identifies R. Sridhar, an NDC officer, as a frequent visitor to Damji's flat.
Tries but fails to kill Vidya
Is run over by a truck during a chase.
Examination of Bob's mobile phone leads Vidya and Rana to an IP address, sending instructions to kill her.
Breaks into Sridhar's office to verify his IP address, but he is alerted electronically and returns to his office.
Accidentally kills Sridhar during a scuffle
Upsets Khan, who had wanted him alive.
Vidya calls Bhaskaran to tell him that she has retrieved sensitive documents from Sridhar's office.
Tells her to contact the local police
Warns her that she should hand over the documents if she wishes to see her husband alive.
Thinks the caller is Damji
followed by Rana and Khan.
Damji cuts the meeting short when Vidya expresses her doubt that he will be able to return her husband in exchange for the sensitive file.
Flees into the crowd before the police arrive.
Neither Vidya nor Arnab Bagchi ever existed and that Vidya had been using the police and the IB to achieve her own ends.
Widow of Major Arup Basu, an IB and Army officer
In the ensuing struggle, Damji draws a gun on her.
Disarms him using the prosthetic belly she has been using to fake her pregnancy and promptly stabbing him in the neck with her hairstick
Finally killing him with his own gun.
